meanings.definition: A male monarch or emperor, especially in Russia before 1917.
meanings.sent1: The tsars ruled over Russia with great power.
meanings.sent2: During the 19th century, the tsars held significant authority in Russia.
meanings.sent3: The tsars decided to have a grand feast in the palace.
meanings.sent4: In history books, the tsars are often portrayed as mighty figures.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tsars sitting on their thrones is etched in our minds.

meanings.definition: The title of a Russian emperor before 1917.
meanings.sent1: The tsars were addressed with great respect by the people.
meanings.sent2: Many legends surround the lives of the Russian tsars.
meanings.sent3: The tsars' fancy hats were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The power of the tsars was as vast as the Russian landscape.
meanings.sent5: The portraits of the tsars adorned the walls of the palace.
